description: Embrace fresh powder days in these ergonomic-fit snow pants built with thermal-reflective lining and synthetic insulation.  Critically seam-sealed to keep water out, these pants feature Omni-Tech™ technology to keep you dry and well ventilated.  A snap gusset and internal leg gaiters keep powder where it belongs. Zip-up pockets keep small items secure.
name: Columbia Sportswear Bugaboo IV Pants, Short - Mens
